content.question: The word "Amazingly" (Paragraph 1) emphasizes the author's

choices.label: dismay that nothing has been done to reduce the number of contrails
surprise at the conclusion of a study
excitement about the sophistication of scientific instruments

content.answer: surprise at the conclusion of a study

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
